dict.acceptation: 不同，相异；不同意，意见相左；争吵；

sent.orig: We adopt differ method for corresponding differ accuracy in radio wave refractive errors correction.
sent.trans: 在电波折射误差修正中，对于不同的精度要求应采用不同的方法。

sent.orig: Since conditions differ from one country to another, their policies should also differ.
sent.trans: 各国情况不同，政策也应该有区别。

sent.orig: Despite what everyone says no one wins the league by Christmas, I beg to differ.
sent.trans: 尽管所有人都认为，没有哪支球队能够在圣诞节就确保夺冠，但我却有不同的看法。

sent.orig: The predicted stability limits often differ appreciably in magnitude from those observed in hot firings.
sent.trans: 预计的稳定性极限往往在数值上与热试中测得的明显不同。

sent.orig: Men are all alike in their promises. It is only in their deeds that they differ.
sent.trans: 人在做承诺的时候都是一样的，是在行动上每个人才显出了区别。
